definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

three major stars of the Three Stars 參宿|参宿[Shen1 xiu4] Chinese constellation/the belt of Orion/three spirits 福[fu2], 祿|禄[lu4], and 壽|寿[shou4] associated with the Three Stars 參宿|参宿[Shen1 xiu4] Chinese constellation
Sanxing or Sanhsing township in Yilan county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], Taiwan/Samsung (South Korean electronics company)

three major stars of the Three Stars 參宿|参宿[Shen1 xiu4] Chinese constellation/the belt of Orion/three spirits 福[fu2], 祿|禄[lu4], and 壽|寿[shou4] associated with the Three Stars 參宿|参宿[Shen1 xiu4] Chinese constellation
(astronomy) giant star/(fig.) superstar (of opera, basketball etc)

sentences.english: Yes, if the world is the sky, then everyone is a star.
sentences.chinese: 是的，如果世界是天空，每一個人便是一顆星。

sentences.english: We saw his star as it rose, and we have come to worship him." Matthew 2:2 (NLT)
sentences.chinese: 我們在東方看見他的星，特來拜他。

sentences.english: And Kansas she says is the name of the star.
sentences.chinese: 她說堪薩斯是那顆星星的名字。

sentences.english: You eyes are two pools that twinkle like starts in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 你的雙眼是兩汪清泉，就像那夜空中閃爍的星。

sentences.english: What type of star was it?
Tonight, stay in 3-star Xiyu Yongsheng Hotel or equivalent.
sentences.chinese: 今晚，住宿於桃園山莊或同級3星酒店。

sentences.english: Epsilon lies at the western edge of the constellation .
sentences.chinese: 星位於這個星座的西邊緣。

sentences.english: Yeah , like the son of JackieChan belongs to it .
sentences.chinese: 知道，像成龍的兒子就屬於“星二代”。

sentences.english: The hotel is designed and built against more than 4-star standard, luxury and comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 酒店按4星以上標準進行設計建設，豪華舒適。

sentences.english: If Pluto was a planet, Eris obviously was too.
sentences.chinese: 如果冥王星是行星，厄里斯星就也該是。

sentences.english: The polarizing beam coupling and splitting technology for LGS is the main part of this study.
sentences.chinese: 重點研究了用於激光導星的偏振耦合分光技術。

sentences.english: The dates are, in fact, astronomical, astrological and astrotheological.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，這個日期是天文學，占星術和星相學。

sentences.english: That's Albireo, which depicts the Swan's eye or beak.
sentences.chinese: 那就是天鵝星，是它勾畫出了天鵝的眼睛或者是鳥喙。

sentences.english: Full of hope, stand on tiptoe, twinkle star be able to touch.
sentences.chinese: 滿滿的心願，踮起腳，閃爍的許願星就能觸到。

sentences.english: They were here the first month of Gaia Star, and are already gone.
sentences.chinese: 他們在這裏的蓋亞星的第一個月，並且已經過去了。

sentences.english: Daughter is young stars, movie stars.
sentences.chinese: 女兒是中國小童星，影視明星。

definition: see 恆星系|恒星系[heng2 xing1 xi4]
celestial body (e.g. planet, satellite etc)/heavenly body
palace/temple/castration (as corporal punishment)/first note in pentatonic scale
5th earthly branch: 7-9 a.m., 3rd solar month (5th April-4th May), year of the Dragon/ancient Chinese compass point: 120°
Mercury in traditional Chinese astronomy/see also 水星[shui3 xing1]
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
